name: Map Generator for Brawl Stars
description:
Use this small game to quickly create a randomized map for the Brawl Stars map maker. There is a setting for Showdown maps as well as a few alternate themes. Some assets used from the Brawl Stars game itself.

IF YOU LIKE THIS, CHECK OUT SOME OF MY OTHER SMALL PROJECTS OR MY YOUTUBE CHANNEL

https://youtube.com/@colttt1

https://kevinkevinkelvin.itch.io
